comment: /**  * Return {@code true} if this buffer is allocated.  * {@code false} if it has been deallocated.  * @since 5.1  */
code: /**  * Return {@code true} if this buffer is allocated.  * {@code false} if it has been deallocated.  * @since 5.1  */ boolean isAllocated().

comment: /**  * Increase the reference count for this buffer by one.  * @return this buffer  */
code: /**  * Increase the reference count for this buffer by one.  * @return this buffer  */ PooledDataBuffer retain().

comment: /**  * Decrease the reference count for this buffer by one,  * and deallocate it once the count reaches zero.  * @return {@code true} if the buffer was deallocated.  * {@code false} otherwise  */
code: /**  * Decrease the reference count for this buffer by one,  * and deallocate it once the count reaches zero.  * @return {@code true} if the buffer was deallocated.  * {@code false} otherwise  */ boolean release().
